name: moADNET, LLC
tag_list: mobile-marketing, mobile-advertising, mobile-ad-network, mobile, multicultural, african-american, hispanic, asian
overview:
moADNET.com is a multicultural mobile ad network developed to help brand marketers and local advertisers reach Hispanic, Asian, African American and special interest groups via mobile devices.

moADNET.com mobile ad server uses the latest technologies to provide advertisers a reliable platform to distribute messages to national and local markets. Geolocation targeting to iPhone, Android, Blackberry and Windows Mobile is a primary focus. Partners include local and national news and entertainment providers.

Available services include:

  • Banner Ad Server/Delivery
  • HTML5 Website & Banner Ad Design
  • Internet Engineering
  • Digital Publishing Consultation
  • Mobile Marketing Consultation
